titleInfo.title: Mansion On The Hill - Hank Williams performance - 1952-04-04 - WSM

mods.abstract: Radio performance of Mansion On The Hill, written by Hank Williams and Fred Rose, and performed by Hank Williams on WSM Nashville, Tenn.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
